channel.title: Tags/Removal Policy on Cino
channel.description: Recent content in Tags/Removal Policy on Cino

item.title: Always set AWS CDK Defaults
item.description: We are nearing the end of the year, the time to reflect on the past year and definitely share the things that went “wrong” or in this case the things that could have been done better. This is one of those things that I wish I knew earlier, and I hope it helps you too.
